Articles.Content:
Hi, 

So I've been playing my career mode for a few weeks now in 1.2.2. I've had moderate success, with an eve/gilly Manned mission that has returned home and a duna/Ike mission that is on its way back, as well as a mission to Jool with Landers for every moon. However, my contracts don't seem to be updating, specifically the world's first contracts. I only had explore eve for the longest time,  and now that I finally finished that one I got an explore gilly. Does this mean you have to complete each body before it gives you new ones? I haven't gotten any other planets in  the worlast first contacts besides kerbin.. 

 

Timmy

This thread is a really good place for you to start your search for knowledge:

@Arsonide's posts in that thread are particularly informative, especially this one:

So it looks like you were nearly right.  You don't have to "complete" each body before moving onto the next one, but you do have to explore it to a certain degree before the next body will show up as a world first.

Hope that helps

 

SM
